name: Candy Corn Mishap
description:
A nightmarish Halloween game made in 3 days for Socpen's Halloween game jam.

You must use your magical gun to fire candy corn at nearby victims, violently bursting them into more delectable candy corn.

It's scary.

[EPILEPSY WARNING]: There's an option to turn off muzzle flash in the game. If you have been diagnosed with a photosensitivity disorder, please make sure to disable muzzle flash when you start to reduce any danger it might pose for you.

CONTROLS:

[Left-Mouse]: Fire Candy

[Right-Mouse]: Alternate Firing Mode

[E]: Interact

[WASD]: Walk

[Left Shift]: Sprint

[Spacebar]: Jump

[Left Control]: Crouch
